title: Mobile Games and False Advertising #MakeMobileGamesGreatAgain
description:
This is a quick video addressing the issue with mobile games and False advertising. More specifically the mobile game called Colony of War.  Enjoy 

War of colony ad was captured by Vadå Yngve - here is his video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rwFJHxrTbak

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
